page.title: 12Use of Transport in Alton
page.content: A survey of 123 people. Buses Regular use for shopping, work, school.............................13% Never used.........................87% Trains Regular use (work, school, shopping)5% Occasional use ( outings etc ).....43% Never used.........................52% Taxis Occasionally used...................4% Never used ........................96% Cars Main form of transport.............85% No car.............................15% Bicycle Regularly used as transport(not sport).............................20% Never used.........................80% Motor cycle Regularly as transport(not sport)...2% Never used.........................98%
